Text: hey greta rip, so what r u using to rip and convert it the way u do?? i do rip blurays to my hard drive but how and what r u using to get this format and size? thanks again

I use a program called Encode-Handheld. Its the Holy Roses/Poppedtart program. PT actually trained me on it. Its command line but its pretty simple once you get used to it. Its for mac and Linux. You can download it here on TPB.....Thx for the feedback
